Profiling¶

Profiling analyses your in terms of speed and/or memory. This can help identify where the bottlenecks are and how much potential there is for improvement.

line_profiler¶

  • IPython magic (Jupyter Lab)

    • Line: %timeit

    • Cell: %%timeit

    • If pip install line_profiler:

      • First load module: %load_ext line_profiler

      • Scripts: %prun

      • Line-by-line: %lprun

        • @profile decorator around the function

memory_profiler¶

  • If pip install memory_profiler:

  • First load module:

    • %load_ext memory_profiler

    • Line: %memit

    • Cell: %%memit

    • Line-by-line: %mprun

…

Profile parallel code¶

  • Example visualisation of profiler.

Further information¶

PythonSpeed.com, Itamar Turner-Trauring
